fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, you may douse someone.
- Ignite, converting all Doused players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your ignition will convert *all* doused players, no matter who the Douse originated from.
- You bypass all conversion immunity.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert everybody who shall oppose you!
